video.title: How to Be a Gentleman
video.synopsis: Prim-and-proper advice columnist Andrew Carlson gets much-needed lessons in real life from a charmingly vulgar personal trainer.

episodes.synopsis: When etiquette columnist Andrew is told he must adapt to the sexier style of his magazine he hires his old bully Bert to help him become a modern man.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Bert tries to teach Andrew how to have a meaningless fling. Mike and Janet seek help from Diane to prepare them for Mike's green card interview.
episodes.title: How To Have A One Night Stand

episodes.synopsis: Bert talks Andrew into attending his ex's wedding for closure, but he discovers his ex met her husband while she and Andrew were still together.
episodes.title: How To Attend Your Ex-Fiancee's Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Andrew and Bert each have their own relationship with the same woman, but Andrew starts to feel short-changed that she spends every night with Bert.
episodes.title: How To Share A Relationship

episodes.synopsis: When Bert sends out angry emails that Andrew drafted but never sent, Andrew scrambles to make things right with the recipients.
episodes.title: How To Be A Draft Andrew

episodes.synopsis: When Andrew refuses to make a move on his attractive new assistant, Bert teaches him a harsh lesson by going out with her.
episodes.title: How Not To Dip Your Pen In The Company Ink

episodes.synopsis: When Andrew is left picking up his Boss Jerry's slack at work, he asks Bert to come on board to serve as his new life coach.
episodes.title: How To Get Along With Your Boss' New Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: When Andrew skips Thanksgiving dinner with his family to rekindle a relationship with his ex, Bert reminds him of his newfound "manhood.
episodes.title: How To Upstage Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: When Andrew is given the opportunity to ask out a model, he is forced to realize that even a gentleman can be shallow about some things.
episodes.title: How To Be Shallow
